name: Zeenoh
overview:
Meet Zeenoh Games

Zeenoh is an independent game developer from the Philippines, which provides end-to-end game development solution on iPhone, iPad, iPod and Android. We plan on being at the forefront of delivering customized and quality mobile applications.

How We Work

Zeenoh Games believes in Open Source Advocacy. Using free and open source tools helps us create better results on game features, functionality and experience.

We implement the use of agile methodology that helps us increase our productivity and reduce risks. It makes game development simpler and more accessible. This process helps us succeed in today’s challenging world.

We make sure that each game that we produce is unique, quality and user-friendly that can pass the standards of Google and Apple.

Who We Are

Zeenoh Games office is in the Philippines, a strategic location to tap the game development industry. Our development team is based in Manila, where you can find talented graphic artists, IT professionals and gaming enthusiasts.

Our team has over 10 years of experience in project management, hardcore programming and rapid application development, cross-platform development and design. We can code using both platforms: MacOSX and Linux. We also keep ourselves updated with the latest trends in tools and technology. Our extensive knowledge and experience, combined with our passion for work, creativity and professionalism, compose our core competencies.

How Zeenoh Started

On a quiet evening in 2008, JD, Zeenoh’s founder, dreamt that he was flying. In the course of his adventure, he was pursued by a big question mark (?) symbol. He was caught up in the chase, and as the symbol stuck to him there was a big explosion. He then saw pieces of letters floating in the horizon. It took a while before he figured out that the set of letters spell his name, and the word “Zeenoh” was highlighted. People sometimes pronounce “Zeenoh” as “Sino”, which means “Who?” in English.

As you become more curious about the games we develop, the more you become interested to Zeenoh Games.

Join Us!

Zeenoh Games would like to be known in the gaming industry. We aspire to create original, beautiful and exciting games that would make every Filipino proud.

The world loves to play. We welcome you to become our partners, collaborators and independent developers. Contact us now and let’s start playing!
